item.title: Over grown tree outside 117 Cazenove Roads, 8th June
item.description:
Tree is droppings branch onto pavements & into Jewish school. Very danger tree. Please can councils come and cut tree pleases. Thank yous

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cazenove Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collapsed fence, 8th June
item.description:
This problem was previously reported ref 7537944 and I was fobbed off with a claim that it was on private property which is untrue. There is lots of LBBexley signage on the fence (see attached photos) and previous problems at this spot have been dealt with by LBBexley. Encouraging people to pay money to HM Land Registry unnecessarily is ridiculous. Please reassess this issue and respond with an honest response. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Erith Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds are never removed, always left to grow. Please remove. Lemmon Road Greenwich, 8th June
item.description:
Lemmon Road runs parallel with the Kent bound platform of Maze Hill station. It is used as a dumping ground for fly tipping. It is NEVER swept !

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Restell Close, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
